title: lol won't launch
body: Haven't been able to launch lol  since may10 was working fine night befor please help

replies.body: When you say LoL won't launch, do you mean you click on the icon and nothing ever happens? If so, there's a good chance that your operating system doesn't recognize the program and is blocking it. It should be easy enough to fix, and we'll need to go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to do the trick though!
